sentences.cn: 他讨厌他们那一套政治。
我恨的就是不拘世俗,恶心的就是不抱世俗.

sentences.en: I hate that damned rubber. I loathe the filthy natives.
sentences.cn: 我恨这晦气的橡胶. 我厌恶这些肮脏的土人.

sentences.en: I loathe having to get up so early in the morning!
sentences.cn: 我对这么早起来实在感到厌恶!

sentences.en: I loathe having to go to these conferences.
sentences.cn: 我最讨厌的是得参加这些会议.

sentences.en: I loathe negativity. I can't stand people who moan.
sentences.cn: 我厌恶消极态度，不能忍受唉声叹气的人。

sentences.en: I loathe the smell of burning rubber.
sentences.cn: 我厌恶燃着的橡胶散发的气味.

sentences.en: Miss Sun was also loathe to say goodbye and couldn't bear to part from Miss Fan.
sentences.cn: 孙小姐也依依惜别,舍不下她.

sentences.en: The two men loathe each other.
sentences.cn: 两个男人互相看不顺眼。

sentences.en: They loathe Bronka Ginsberg but aren't about to cross her.
sentences.cn: 他们厌恶勃隆卡?京斯贝格,但不想和她作对.

sentences.en: We hate and loathe these veritable fiends.
sentences.cn: 我们痛恨、厌恶这些不折不扣的魔鬼.

sentences.en: We loathe each other, yet we seem doomed constantly to meet.
sentences.cn: 我们相互厌恶, 但似乎偏偏冤家常碰头.

sentences.en: We loathe the daily bread that prolongs useless existence.
sentences.cn: 我们憎恨每天的饮食,因为是这些东西使我们拖延着无用的生命.

sentences.en: Would the picture teach him to loathe his own soul?
sentences.cn: 这幅画是否会教他去厌弃自己的心灵 呢 ?

sentences.en: You loathe the smell of greasy food when you are seasick.
sentences.cn: 当你晕船时,你会厌恶油腻的气味.

trans.tran_en: to hate someone or something very much

trans.tran_cn: 憎恨，厌恶（某人、某事物），[口]极不喜欢（某事物）
trans.tran_en: to hate someone or something very much
